LanguageData.ColdFusionReactor.label: Cold fusion reactor
LanguageData.ColdFusionReactor.description: A reactor operating in uranium, but based on the principle of cold fusion. Almost does not emit heat, but it is a good source of energy.
LanguageData.ColdFusionReactorHeath.label: Cold fusion reactor heart
LanguageData.ColdFusionReactorHeath.description: The main part of the cold fusion reactor. With the help of it, it will be possible to modernize a nuclear reactor in order to obtain a new, more perfect source of energy.
LanguageData.MiniColdFusionReactor.label: Minified cold fusion reactor
LanguageData.MiniColdFusionReactor.description: Reduced cold fusion reactor. Still effective, but takes up much less space, so it can be used in a wider range of objects.
LanguageData.MiniArcReactor.label: Minified arc reactor
LanguageData.MiniArcReactor.description: Reduced arc reactor. More effective than a cold fusion reactor, is its direct modification.
LanguageData.Mk1PowerStation.label: MK1 power station
LanguageData.Mk1PowerStation.description: Charging station and create armor type MK1
LanguageData.ArcReactor.label: Arc reactor
LanguageData.ArcReactor.description: A reactor operating in uranium, but based on the principle of cold fusion. Almost does not emit heat, but it is a good source of energy.
LanguageData.PalladiumCore.label: Palladium core
LanguageData.PalladiumCore.description: The main source of energy. Despite the radioactivity, the design of the reactor does not allow it to affect the environment.
LanguageData.Enricher.label: Enricher
LanguageData.Enricher.description: Inflates to the core and core, enhancing the generation of energy.
LanguageData.ZeroPointReactor.label: Zero point reactor
LanguageData.ZeroPointReactor.description: A reactor built by someone who has reached an incredible level of science. These generators extract vacuum energy, providing an almost unlimited supply of energy.
LanguageData.VacuumTube.label: Vacuum tube
LanguageData.VacuumTube.description: The main part of the reactor, it generates energy.
LanguageData.VacuumStabilizer.label: Vacuum stabilizer
LanguageData.VacuumStabilizer.description: Stabilizes pressure and creates zero electromagnetic radiation.
LanguageData.VacuumPump.label: Vacuum pump
LanguageData.VacuumPump.description: A pump used to control the level of oxygen and its composition in the room. It is an important component for the operation of the zero point reactor.
LanguageData.SingularReactor.label: Singular reactor
LanguageData.SingularReactor.description: The source of energy, where microscopic black holes (collapsars) are used as the working medium. The principle of operation of such a reactor is the use of energy released during the evaporation of a black hole.
LanguageData.SuperMagnetNewGeneration.label: Super Magnet New Generation
LanguageData.SuperMagnetNewGeneration.description: Supermagnet, from an unknown material that holds a black hole.
LanguageData.QuantumConverter.label: Quantum converter
LanguageData.QuantumConverter.description: The main component that converts (captures) radiation from the evaporation of a black hole and converts it into energy.
LanguageData.Catapult.label: Medieval Catapult
LanguageData.Catapult.description: A massive cannon that uses large stone balls as projectiles. When the projectile is broken on the ground, the fragments damage everything around.
LanguageData.Artillery_Catapult.label: Medieval Catapult
LanguageData.Artillery_Catapult.description: A massive cannon that uses large stone balls as projectiles. When the projectile is broken on the ground, the fragments damage everything around.
LanguageData.BigBalls.label: Stone big ball
LanguageData.BigBalls.description: A massive stone ball designed for catapults.
LanguageData.Ballista.label: Medieval ballista
LanguageData.Ballista.description: A massive weapon that uses huge arrows as projectiles. Slow, but for what kind of holes it leaves!
LanguageData.Artillery_Ballista.label: Medieval ballista
LanguageData.Artillery_Ballista.description: A massive weapon that uses huge arrows as projectiles. Slow, but for what kind of holes it leaves!
LanguageData.BigArrows.label: Big arrow
LanguageData.BigArrows.description: The big arrow from a stone and steel intended for a ballist.
